ResearchProjectDef.label: 14.5mm Heavy MG Turret
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows you to build a 14.5mm Heavy Machine Gun Turret. This turret needs to be manned and uses 14.5mmx15 Heavy MG Bullets for ammo. A slower fire rate on this machine gun allows for suppressing fire to keep enemies pinned in place.

ResearchProjectDef.label: 155mm Howitzer Cannon Turret
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows you to build a 155m howitzer Cannon Turret. This turret needs to be manned and uses 155m Howitzer Shells for ammo. This long ranged artillery can launch a heavy, explosive shell over walls and through thin roofs.

ResearchProjectDef.label: 130mm Missile Launchers
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows you to build the 130mm Light, Medium and Heavy Missile Systems. These turrets need to be manned and use 130mm Missiles for ammo, the type depends on the turret. These are 130mmx1 (Light System), 130mmx3 (Medium System) and 130mmx6 (Heavy System). These turrets can fire explosive missiles over long distances, over walls and through thin roofs.

ResearchProjectDef.label: EMP Mortar Launcher
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows you to build the EMP Mortar Launcher. This turret needs to be manned and uses 80mm EMP Mortar Shells for ammo. It is mainly intended to to be used to defend against Mechanoid attacks. The shells can fire over walls.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Laser Turret
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows you to build a Laser Turret. This turret needs to be manned and powered, but does not need ammo. It can set targets on fire.

ResearchProjectDef.label: 120mm Cannon Turret
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows you to build a 120mm Cannon Turret. This turret needs to be manned and uses 120mm Cannon Shells for ammo. This powerful cannon has a long range and good accuracy. It deals extra armor-piercing damage if the round has a direct hit.

ResearchProjectDef.label: 35mm Automated Autocannon
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows you to build the 35mm Automated Autocannon. This turret does not need to be manned, requires power and does not use ammo. It deals bonus armor-piercing damage if the round has a direct hit.
